From the brand

All in One Tools

Easy to Work

Gifts for Men

To My Best Love

How did we get started?

We started out as architects. Inspired by our day-to-day tool usage, we founded ForChic with a commitment to giving everyone the perfect tool they need.

What makes our products different?

Satisfying every customer is our ultimate pursuit. To get it, we need to optimize every detail at all costs.

Why do we love what we do?

We like to learn more about our competitors every day, learn from others’ strengths and improve them, and over time, our products will become more and more impeccable, and more and more customers will be satisfied.

High Precise Shape Duplication: Copy any shape or duplicate any object profile with ease. Great for tiling, wallpapering, circular frames, ducts fitting tiles, laminate, carpet, checking dimensions, moulding, etc. Useful tool for operations on car bodies, carpentry and for all kinds of modelling.
Adjustable Tightness and Locking Feature: Never worry about too loose or too tight of plastic pins to slide in. Using an bonus little Allen wrench You can simply adjust the tightness of plastic pins according to your preferences. Once the object has been contoured, lock contour gauge teeth in place for perfect identical traces every time.
Premium Material and Durable:The contour gauge is made of high quality ABS plastic, high strength, rustproof and durable, that will not easily break. And no harm for the surface of the target you would like to shape and duplicate. It is smooth to push and no lack of pins to influence precision.
Easy to Use: Guide the contour gauge’s teeth onto the object, lock the teeth in place, and trace. Copy it, Lock it, Trace it, Only 3 steps, you can easily copy and transfer the shape you want.
Customer Service: Quality and Customer Satisfaction are our top priorities. If you are not satisfied, no reason return policy to guarantee you the BEST purchase experience. And all ForChic products come with 24 hours friendly customer service.

With the ForChic Contour Gauge can easily copy any shape and is simple to use without any guessing, calculation and learning curve. Because it is simple and accurate, it can immediately reduce wasted materials and is good value for money. Very suitable for winding pipes, pipes, woodworking, most types of molding, etc.

Aluminum Lock Design

Metal locking mechanism keeps the shape stable to achieve high precision，designed for easy transfer and efficient work，Making your work more convenient.

Premium Plastic and High Precision

The contour gauge shape duplicator is made of high quality ABS plastic,high strength,rustproof and durable.Single needle down to 0.06″, providing a more accurate data.

Widened Design is More Practical

ForChic contour gauge profile tool is 50% wider than traditional profile gauge, the deepest could reach 2.5 inches, making it very suitable to contour deeper shapes meticulously.

item.title: Automotive Smoke Machine Leak Detector, VXSCAN EVAP Vacuum Leakage Tester, Fuel Pipe Diagnostic Tester with Flow Meter & Pressure Gauge for All 12V Vehicles
item.dc:creator: admin

We develop the tools for you and the market, and then we use and test them over and over to ensure everyone can enjoy our ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $179.99 - $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:41 UTC – Details)

From the brand

About VXSCAN

Since our founding, VXSCAN has been committed to providing the best products, prices and services to the automotive tool market. We develop the tools for you and the market, and then we use and test them over and over to ensure everyone can enjoy our high-quality products.

VXSCAN’s Value

VXSCAN has the most comprehensive product portfolio, dedicated staff and dedicated technical team to help you with all your vehicle needs and projects.

VXSCAN’s Vision

We share the same passion for vehicles as you do. Our focus is to provide you with the ultimate experience through exceptional service.

VXSCAN’s Mission

To provide professional, efficient and high quality automotive diagnostic products so that every car owner around the world can enjoy a better life made possible by technology.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.67 x 9.88 x 6.85 inches; 5.2 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 19, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ VXSCAN
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B1QGP86W

【EVAP SMOKE MACHINE】VXSCAN V3 is a professional vacuum machine for car fuel pipe system leak detection. Supports EVAP system test, tightness test, intake system test, exhaust system test and various pipe fittings test. V3 smoke leak detector will help you solve the problem, saving time and money.
【EASY TO USE】By heating USP mineral oil or baby oil, the automotive smoke machine can be outputs lots of smoke within 30 seconds, to improve diagnosis efficiency. This evap smoke machine built-in air pump, you don’t need to purchase extra. V3 help you control the smoke effect easily and allowing you to estimate the size of the leak by the change of the gauge value.
【SMOKE FLOW METER & PRESSURE GAUGE】Equipped with pressure gauge and adjustable flow meter which helps you control the smoke effect easily. When the pressure gauge runs to the maximum, the flow meter drops to 0, indicating that your pipeline is not leaking. On the contrary, it means there is smoke leakage.
【Air Mode & Smoke Mode】The V3 smoke leak tester adopts an independent switch control design, the air mode independently controls the built-in air pump, the smoke mode independently controls the smoke generator. With intelligent protection, if the working limit is exceeded, the power will be automatically turned off to ensure the safety of the operator and equipment.
【WIDELY COMPATIBILITY】Our package includes all accessories (Oil not included), it supports detect the leaks of multi pipe systems on cars, motorcycles, snowmobiles, off-road vehicles, ATVs, light trucks and speedboats boats. The fuel pipeline leak diagnostic machine is suitable for all brands and models of cars.

VXSCAN V3 Automotive Smoke Machine is a universal and professional auto pipe leak detect tool, it will help us position cars motorcycles leakage on the pipe systems quickly and exactly.

VXSCAN V3 TESTER SUPPORTS:

  • Crankcase System Test
  • Intake System Test
  • Car Sealing Test
  • Fuel Tank System Test
  • Turbo Leaks Test
  • Various Pipe Fittings Test
  • Exhaust System Test
  • EVAP System Test

V3 evap smoke machine can produce lots of smoke within 30s, help mechanic detect the leaks in pipe system.

2 MODE CONTROL:

  • Smoke Control: After pressing this switch, the power indicator light is on to indicate that the power supply is normal.
  • Air Control: Press the AIR MODE, pump starts working, only after this, you may press and start the SMOKE MODE.

Read more

What’s In the Box

  • 1pcs * Car Smoke Leak Detector
  • 1pcs * Hook (with hand-tighten nuts)
  • 1pcs * Universal Intake Bladder
  • 1pcs * Intake Bladder Replacement Rubber
  • 1pcs * Smoke Hose
  • 1pcs * Power Cord
  • 1pcs * Funnel & Oil Bottle (No oil includ)
  • 1pcs * User Manual

Notice before Leak Test

  • Turn OFF the Ignition of Your Vehicle
  • Use baby oil, Pure #5 white oil is the best choice if available.
  • Only support a 12V battery with a current range of 8-10A. (Ordinary car batteries are eligible)
Specification

  • Output Pressure: 7-12 PSI
  • Output Flow: <6 L/Min
  • Power Supply: 12V automobile Battery 6Amp
  • Air Pressure Output: Built-in air pump
  • Test Oil Capacity: 10-20ml
  • Length of Power Cord: 2.5Meters
  • Length of Smoke Hose: 2.5Meters
  • Package Weight: 2.3kg/5 lb
  • Main Unit Dimensions: 7.28*5.11*3.34 inch
  • Package Dimensions: 12.2*9.44*4.52 inch

Read more

How to

  • Fill 10-20ml baby oil to the evap smoke machine for the first time (Do not inject too much at once).
  • Open the engine cover, and hang the detector in the cover.

Use

  • Disconnect the pipes that need to be connected with the smoke leak detector.
  • Insert universal Adapter Cone or other accessories and test pipe.

Leak

  • Connect your car leak test machine power cord to the 12V vehicle battery (red clip to battery positive, black clip to ground, then the power LED will light up, otherwise you need to check the power)
  • Inset the Smoke delivery hose to ddapter cone.

Tester

  • Press Air Control Switch, wait for seconds until the system is pressurized, check the Pressure Gauge & Flow Meter reading for leak status. Turn on the smoke generator, adjust the smoke amount to suitable amount so you can locate the leak position quickly.
  • The leak can be judged according to where the smoke appears.

Read more

Pressure Gauge

Displays the output pressure of the machine or show the real time pressure of the system been testing.

NO Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge remains unchanged, it means that there is no leakage in the system.

Small Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge drops, it indicates a small leak in the system.

Massive Leak: When the value of the pressure gauge reaches zero, it indicates a large leak in the system.

Air Flow Meter

Provide a quick visual indication of the amount of air/smoke passing through the system being tested.

Check the Pressure Gauge & Flow Meter reading for leak status, V3 evap smoke machine can help you find and fix leak problems quickly!

Overload Protection

VXSCAN V3 automotive smoke machine leak detector has built in self-protective system: Overheat and Anti-frost Protection. When the temperature of the device exceeds 120℃, power protection will be intelligently activated to turn it off. The device can also work normally at -20℃. You don’t have to worry about switching on and off the machine constantly during diagnosis. The system takes care of the load for you.

Read more

4.5
Price: $179.99 - $165.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:41 UTC – Details)
